channel.title: Server stat carry overs?
channel.description:
k well i dunno if this happens 2 ne1 else but sometimes when 1 server goes offline and i go to another 1 my stats carry over...
eg. this happened last night
wannafightscape goes down for the night. i was pkin and what not (99 str 99 mage 70def 70atk)
so i go on a server that i never been on before... all my other stats r fine but 1's already listed were 1 but had xp of the other skills...
this has happened a few times... jw if its normal or what?
